chapter.title: How to install the .netbridge
chapter.section: User installationIf you are downloading the binary files, you just have to include all the dll's from the downloaded file

Developer installationTo install the .netbridge, you have to download the source code and using maven to build the project. This will creates the dlls Interface and Implementation , which can be inclueded to every project.
The netbridge has some dependencies, which are generated as well and included in the zip file in the folder assembly/target.
If you use npanday in your project, instede of adding the file from the .netbridge zip (assembly/target), you can add the dependencies over maven dependencies
